body: Hi Claudia, I have done some tests and it is possible to create the legend that is suitable for you. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KZdONCIBf2DgsBHkeAS1if3fityDz48REllipzTUPHoXFknFK-LKa*5xG9KT98d3f0OVAScY7T80ZNI6vSY7osYd-WZYhBwd/LB_legend.png) but you should modify two lines of Ladybug Ladybug code.. I think we have to write something easier to do that. Thus, I ask you if you can wait for that, I have to talk with Mostapha and Chris. Thanks Furthermore, you could just use 'Ladybug contourMesh' to achieve a pretty visualization, but it requires some changes, too. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KZdONCIBf2AlqzzCqRRdycm5x0eTvpA2JBWeVXAhytFW6ihsZwkpmL-Wvbl-BbDxJt4JkVKf9ewba2nJwHGbsZN479xD6rv8/LB_legend_2.png) - Antonello
